name: overpopulation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of a country or city, etc. having too many people for the amount of food, materials, and space available there: Overpopulation is one of the country's most pressing social problems. People are dying because of overpopulation, poverty, and disease. See
overpopulated
More examplesFewer examplesGlobal overpopulation must be the top priority of any administration.Contraception has helped prevent overpopulation.What are the government doing to tackle the overpopulation problem?
